publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2291.1 Frances Curran:Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2291) in the name of Mr Tom McCabe, leave out from “agrees” to end and insert “does not agree to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) (No. 2) Bill because it believes that the budget is insufficient to avoid job losses in the public sector and that the efficiency savings will lead to less efficient public services, is insufficient to protect, let alone improve, the pay and conditions of public sector workers, is insufficient to implement equal pay for women and is based on further fragmentation and privatisation of public services.” Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
